passive.name: DRAW A BEAD
passive.description:
(PASSIVE) DRAW A BEAD
                                Increases the range of attacks, Explosive Charge, and Buster Shot by 10 per level.
notes: range of attacks, Explosive Charge, and Buster Shot by 10 per level

q.name: (Q) RAPID FIRE
q.description:
(Q) RAPID FIRE
 18/17/16/15s  
                                
                                
                                Gain 50/75/100/125% bonus Attack Speed for 7 seconds.

w.name: (W) ROCKET JUMP
w.description:
(W) ROCKET JUMP
 22/19/16/13s   60 
                                
                                
                                Leap to a target location, dealing 85 magic damage (85/155/225/295 + 50% ) and slowing nearby enemies by 60% for 1.5/2/2.5/3s.Takedowns and fully stacked Explosive Charge detonations on champions reset Rocket Jump's cooldown.

e.name: (E) EXPLOSIVE CHARGE
e.description:
(E) EXPLOSIVE CHARGE
 15/14/13/12s   55/60/65/70 
                                
                                
                                Passive: Enemies explode when killed by Tristana's attacks, dealing 55 magic damage (55/85/115/145 + 25% ) to nearby enemies.Active: Places a bomb on an enemy or turret, dealing 50 physical damage (50/75/100/125 + 65/100/135/170%  + 50/70/90/110% ) to nearby enemies. Tristana's attacks and abilities charge the bomb's damage by 30% stacking 4 times.Bombs explode immediately at full stacks. Explosion radius is double for bombs placed on turrets.

r.name: (R) BUSTER SHOT
r.description:
(R) BUSTER SHOT
 70/65/60s   100 
                                
                                
                                Fires a massive cannonball at an enemy, dealing 350 magic damage (350/450/550 +Â 100% ) and knocking them back.
